boardgame.name: Western Legends
boardgame.description: Western Legends is an open-world sandbox tabletop adventure for 2-6 players set in the American Wild West. Players assume the roles of historical figures of the era, earning their legendary status in a variety of ways: gamble, drive cattle, prospect for gold, rob the bank, fight bandits, pursue stories, become an outlaw, keep the peace. The possibilities are darn near endless._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;How will you write your name on the face of history?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Western Legends Kickstarter Legendary pledge. Includes: Core game Fistful of Extras Expansion (all 25 unlocked stretch goals) The Good, the Bad, and the Handsome expansion
Please note: This is a pre-order. Western Legends is slated for an August 2018 delivery. Description: Western Legends is an open-world sandbox tabletop adventure for 2-6 players set in the American Wild West. Players assume the roles of historical figures of the era, earning their legendary status in a variety of ways: gamble, drive cattle, prospect for gold, rob the bank, fight bandits, pursue stories, become an outlaw, keep the peace. The possibilities are darn near endless. How will write your name on the face of history?

A Western tabletop adventure of legendary proportions for 2-6 players in 90 minutes or less. Includes: - Core Game - Fistful of Extras Expansion (All Unlocked Stretch Goals) - The Good the Bad _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; the Handsome Expansion
